title: DIA V Adc LF Team or duo partner (Dia+)
body:
Hi,

I'm Albert aka Knooti, 19 y/o from Berlin.
Main Adc since I started playin league, basically ;)

I'm looking for a try-hard team with mates who are fun to play with as well ofc. Focus on improve :) I'd love to play Tournaments at some point. I have experience with playin in a 5 man Team. The longest i was in one was ~1,5 years.

If you are a support and u look for a duo mate it would be nice if u are interested in joining a "tryhard" -team as well - so we can look for one together.

Languages: German>English

Add me in game: Knooti

Greetings Albert
